title: Interpretation of a dream about defecation, interpretation of a dream about defecating in front of people, and a lot of defecation in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about defecation: Defecation in a dream is considered one of the disgusting dreams that leave the viewer with a state of revulsion, disgust, and confusion. Therefore, many people search for an explanation for this vision, the interpretation of which varies from one person to another based on several factors. Whether he is a relative or unmarried, regardless of his psychological and financial condition. Interpretation of dreams of defecation by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of defecation in dreams? If a person sees excrement in a dream, this means that he will alleviate his anxiety, remove his worries that were disturbing his life, and stand before his hopes and aspirations that he wants. Achieve it. One of the interpreters believes that this vision is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money, but through illegal means that God will not bless. If the dreamer is sad and sees this dream, this is evidence of his harm and feeling of grief and sadness as a result of being exposed to false words that tarnish his reputation, and if It stands out in an unknown place, this is evidence that it indicates that he obtained a lot of money through illegal means. Seeing a divorced woman, this vision symbolizes the removal of worry and sadness from her life, and the feeling of joy and her return to her ex-husband again. Interpretation of dreams about Ibn Sereniri’s son defecating You will see that defecation in a dream is evidence of the presence of a trustworthy friend in the dreamer’s life who keeps his secrets and helps him get rid of the worries and problems that surround him. This dream suggests that money goes to zakat and charity to atone for sins and questionable actions and to make some decisions without thinking carefully and feeling remorse. Defecation symbolizes Until he enters into a new relationship as quickly as possible, and if it is in his hand, this is evidence of his freedom from problems and his return to God, repentant and fearful. Whoever sees himself defecating in a dream indicates that he will remove his worries and misfortunes and ease his distress, and if he defecates a lot, this is an indication of his delay in accomplishing some His tasks that he had been planning for a long time. If he sees himself defecating in a place he knows, this is evidence that he spent a lot of money to no avail and on matters that God is not pleased with. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get On the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about defecation for a single woman: Seeing a girl who cannot defecate in a dream means that she is suffering from many crises and is facing difficulties in resolving them. It means that she has stopped committing major sins, escaped death, and is stable and comfortable. If she is sick and sees this dream, this is a sign of her recovery. She will be freed from the pain of her illness. The financial crisis and her debts will be large. Her going out in the street indicates that she has committed sins and immoralities, and that she will be exposed to a scandal among people, and she will feel sad, upset, and lonely, and no one will stand by her. In water, this is evidence that he will suffer many financial losses. Cleaning her from excrement in a dream indicates that she is connected to someone who does not deserve her and will harm her, and indicates that she will achieve her goals and objectives by any means, right or corrupt. If she is rich and sees herself defecating, this indicates She goes out with money for God's sake to help

title: Accompanying the dead in a dream

preview.html: Since seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that deals with many details, especially if the dead person is accompanying the living, and through this article we will examine for you everything related to the vision of accompanying the dead. Interpretation of the vision of accompanying the deceased in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees that there is a dead person accompanying her, but she does not want to accompany him in the dream. An insightful sign of a bright future life. While the unmarried girl saw that she was accompanying the dead, she was happy about that in the dream. The vision indicated that I heard Happy news for the unmarried girl. Seeing one girl accompanying more than one dead person in a dream. The meaning of the vision may depend on the fact that many people propose it to her in reality. Dreaming of accompanying a deceased friend in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes marriage to one of her relatives. Interpretation of seeing an escort The unknown dead person in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign that she will achieve what she desires in the life she lives. Perhaps the dream of accompanying the dead and speaking in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates success at work or success in study. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a dead woman’s breasts for a married woman. Interpretation of a vision The entourage of the deceased in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees the deceased accompanying him in a dream indicates that the husband will travel to a far place. And a dream of accompanying a lot of dead people in a married woman’s dream. Indicates a husband’s trip to a far place and the husband will recommend someone to take care of his wife. Interpretation of the vision of accompanying the unknown The deceased in a married woman’s dream is a sign of getting rid of marital problems and worries. It symbolizes the vision of accompanying the deceased, but she is not satisfied with being with him. In a dream about a married woman. This can mean reducing the marital problems that exist between the spouses. And if the married woman sees that she Accompanying the deceased father in a dream. This indicates getting rid of the problems present in the life of the person who has the vision. Accompanying the unknown dead person in the sleep of a married woman. An indication of the good that will come to her in the coming days with the help of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a dead person accompanying the dead person in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of the vision of accompanying the deceased and being taken by the deceased. To a beautiful place with a married man in a dream. It is an indication of achieving what the dreamer desires. And seeing a married man accompanying the dead, and being forced to do so in a dream. The vision shows that this man is not comfortable with his wife in reality, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the man sees For a married man, he accompanies the deceased and leaves him in a dream. A vision sign of escaping from the responsibilities of his home. A dream about the death of an unknown person accompanies a married man in a dream. It is a sign of getting rid of some thoughts that were already controlling him. And if the married man sees that he accompanied the deceased, take him to A far away place, and the dreamer was upset with him in the dream. The vision showed that there are many problems dominating his life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And the dream of accompanying the unknown dead person while he laughs in a married man’s dream. D - To hear the good news from the dreamer. The meaning of accompanying the deceased in a dream. With a married man, it means contentment with how God dealt with the dreamer

title: Interpretation of a dream about being naked for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about nudity for a married woman: There are some strange dreams, including the interpretation of a dream about nudity for a married woman. It is a dream that has many different interpretations, and its interpretations vary depending on the state of nudity that the person saw in his dream. A dream about naked people in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The site explains the difference between the interpretation of a dream about being naked for a married woman and Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this. The dream has different interpretations as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of a dream about nudity is a symbol of the emergence of some hidden issues over others and the deterioration of the dreamer’s condition. Being naked in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is evidence of lack of character or money or poor living. When a man sees in his dream that he is naked in In the street and there are many people looking forward to his nakedness, this dream indicates the emergence of many problems between the dreamer and his wife and ends with the death of the husband and divorce. Or homelessness and the disintegration of the family. Seeing a man in his dream who is naked and asking someone for a cover is evidence that this man will lose a lot of money and his property will disappear due to simple mistakes. Being naked in a dream is a sign of the enemy who is leading the person away from the right and upright path. Being naked in a dream by Ibn Sirin is a sign of actions that the dreamer will do and later regret. For a man to see in his dream that his wife is taking off her clothes and urinating is evidence that this person is treating his wife harshly and rudely. The interpretation of being naked in a dream can express the dreamer’s secrets revealed to the public And the scandal and his great sadness about that. Interpretation of seeing naked people in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing someone in his dream taking off his clothes in front of people without showing the naked area is evidence that this person is suffering from many difficulties in life. But if the private area appears, then this dream Evidence of a scandal for the dreamer in many of his secrets. Seeing someone in his dream who is naked and very shy and asking someone for clothes is evidence of this dreamer’s need for money and his poverty. If a person sees in his dream that he is taking off his clothes and looking at his private area, then this vision is considered An unwanted vision that has many unpleasant connotations for the person who sees it and may be evidence of his imprisonment or separation. Work. If you are suffering from an illness and you see in your dream that you are taking off your clothes, then this dream indicates that you will get rid of your illness and recover from it soon. Dreaming of a dying person naked is considered a bad dream, indicating that the dreamer will suffer from poverty and his condition will get worse. Seeing A dead person naked without showing his nakedness is evidence of the dreamer’s good circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman being naked, taking off all her clothes, and looking at herself in the mirror is evidence that this woman has problems, fears, and widespread discontent in her home. A woman who looks at her organs in a dream is a sign of the separation of these The woman about her husband. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone took off her clothes and took off her clothes, then this dream indicates that this girl will fall victim to someone who is not good and deceitful. Interpretation of a dream about nudity for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman naked in the dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about praise in a dream

preview.html: Today we are discussing our topic from your website gptafser.com/ about the interpretation of a dream about praising God in a dream for single and married girls, men, pregnant women, and young men. Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream for a single girl. Praising or carrying a rosary in a dream for an unmarried girl. It indicates that the girl has a lot of knowledge that she acquires in Her life, which may be a religious science. Seeing a girl in a dream receiving a rosary from someone as a gift and praising her. Seeing an unmarried girl indicates that she is receiving advice from one or both of her parents, and the advice may be from a wise person who takes care of the girl. Seeing a single girl in Her dream is that she is swimming. The vision indicates that there will be goodness and blessings in the life of an unmarried girl, by God’s command, in the near future. Evacuation scholars interpreted the vision of seeing unmarried women in a dream as swimming a lot. A sign of her marriage sooner rather than later. It interprets seeing an unmarried girl in Dreaming about her carrying a rosary or a rosary. This is a vision that indicates the girl’s excessive worship and asceticism in her love of God. It may be an indication that the unmarried girl will travel soon, by God’s command. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream indicates that she is glorifying God or carrying a rosary. Until it ends soon. All her worries, sorrows, and pains in her life are commanded by God alone, and she must be patient. See also: Interpretation of a dream about praising oneself with one’s hand. Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is praising God. The vision shows that she is one of the patient women in raising her children, and that she dominates her work as a wife. And mother. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is doing a good deed and says, “Glory be to God,” while putting the rosary in her hand. Her vision shows that she is an organized person in her social, family, and religious life. Seeing a married woman in her dream losing her rosary. The vision indicates that the great effort she is making The married woman will be lost in reality. In the event that the married woman suffers from childlessness or has children and wants to become pregnant again, then if she sees in her dream the Rosary or that she is glorifying her Lord Almighty. The vision shows that God will soon conceive the married woman with His permission. Seeing a woman Married in her dream may indicate praise. With nice skin that she will soon obtain by the command of Almighty God. The sheikhs of dream interpretation interpreted it as a sign of benefit, goodness, and blessing that the woman will receive in her next life, and God knows best than us. Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream about a man and its meaning. Interpretation of a man seeing that someone What is in the dream gave him a rosary as a gift. The vision shows that he treats his wife well and she reciprocates the matter. And that she is a woman of good morals and religion, and always his supporter in life. Seeing the same man in a dream while he is praising God. His vision showed the piety and faith that characterize this man in reality. Some dream interpretation scholars have interpreted it as a sign that sorrows, worries, and fate in the dreamer’s life will soon disappear by God’s command. When a man saw in a dream that he was praying, and after he finished his prayer

The sheikhs of dream interpretation interpreted it as a sign of benefit, goodness, and blessing that the woman will receive in her next life, and God knows best than us. Interpretation of seeing praise in a dream about a man and its meaning. Interpretation of a man seeing that someone What is in the dream gave him a rosary as a gift. The vision shows that he treats his wife well and she reciprocates the matter. And that she is a woman of good morals and religion, and always his supporter in life. Seeing the same man in a dream while he is praising God. His vision showed the piety and faith that characterize this man in reality. Some dream interpretation scholars have interpreted it as a sign that sorrows, worries, and fate in the dreamer’s life will soon disappear by God’s command. When a man saw in a dream that he was praying, and after he finished his prayer

title: Interpretation of seeing fangs relaxed in a dream

Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and other translators in ancient and modern times, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing a loose canine in a dream? Seeing the canine shaking and trembling in a dream indicates instability and bad psychological and social conditions. Seeing a possessed dog being removed in a man’s dream of his own volition indicates... Gaining money. Dreaming of teeth falling out. It shows many bad words and many mistakes. Seeing the front teeth falling out In a dream for a girl, it indicates the death of a close person or the departure of a family member and being away from him. A dream about teeth falling out of clothes for a married woman shows that she will be pregnant soon. If a married woman sees that all her teeth have fallen out, it indicates the problems she faces in her life and her exposure to adversity. Seeing a general shaking in a dream for a married woman indicates the illness or death of a family member. See also: Interpretation of a vision Sickle teeth in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a loose fang in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees her fangs relaxing in a dream, this indicates that childbirth is approaching and that the newborn will enjoy good health. A dream about lower teeth falling out in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates discomfort and fatigue during pregnancy and childbirth. What is the interpretation of a vision? A loose canine tooth in a dream for a divorced woman? If the divorced woman sees that she is removing her weak teeth, it indicates the collapse of anxiety and worry and overcoming adversity. Seeing it indicates that she is exposed to adversity and distress and that there are those who hate her and may hurt her and hurt her. It is mentioned that the debt was written off because he was suffering from an accumulation of debts. Seeing moving and vibrating teeth in a dream indicates instability in the dreamer’s life, whether psychological, financial, or social. Seeing the language falling out indicates the return of the traveler or the absent person. Or reconciliation with a close person. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna by single women: Henna is one of the cosmetic tools that women have used since ancient times, and its use is not limited to women only, but men can use it to dye the hair of the head or beard, and it is also used to treat some skin diseases. A natural way to stay away from chemical ointments, and today we present to you the interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream for a single woman and what her vision indicates. What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand for a single woman? Henna is used to dye a girl’s hair and change its color as a type of cosmetic surgery. She also paints her hand and fingers so that her appearance appears Elegant, but today we will list the opinions of commentators on the girl’s vision. Applying henna only to the hand, so let us know these opinions closely. Since henna in reality expresses joy and happiness, it also shows in a dream the positive changes that occur in an individual’s life and contribute to his happiness. If she sees that she inserted some of it into a deep bowl, And she proceeded to put it in her hand, there is a constant search that she is doing in reality, in order to escape from the monotony of the life that she lives, and find something that distracts her from thinking about the pain that she suffered in the past. And when she actually wears it and finds its beautiful appearance on the hand and the engravings that made it look wonderful, then The dream indicates that this girl will succeed in her life and put her feet on the first steps towards the desired goal. If the girl is of school and study age, whether in school or university, the henna she puts on her hand has a beautiful appearance, and is evidence of her success in study and higher grades than she expected. The vision can also express the closeness of the girl’s relationship with a person in whom she found all the characteristics she required in her future husband. In fact, she waited for a long time and did not want to communicate with anyone who would propose to her, as long as she did not find him under the conditions that she specified. But if she sees that she is applying henna on One of her legs, a job offer soon comes to her, but unfortunately she loses the opportunity, as a result of the long time she spent thinking about the offer, which made someone else more. Determination to gather the opportunity and take advantage of it. If henna is randomly scratched on her hand, until it looks ugly, then in reality she is not good at planning her life, and randomness and chaos are an integral part of it, which does not make her feel at ease and does not make her feel at ease. It achieves what you want, because in the beginning it has no specific goal, and the visionary must rearrange her priorities so that she can use the time for what is useful and useful. Inappropriate inscriptions may also express her marriage in the future to a man who does not know how to deal with her, and does not understand her. He may disagree with him on many basic matters and find flaws in him that he did not notice. The past, or she hastened to marry him, believing that it was the best way to get rid of the specter of delaying marriage.Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a single woman by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a single woman according to Ibn SirinIbn Sirin said that the girl uses henna from the standpoint of filling the void and appearing good-looking, And the unmarried woman who sees this dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wife’s divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of the dream of separating one’s wife in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of divorcing one’s wife in a dream. Is a husband divorcing his wife once in a dream different from a husband divorcing his wife two or three times? Important clues, especially with this vision, in the article below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about divorcing one’s wife. Interpretation of divorcing one’s wife in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. If the dreamer was afflicted with a serious illness in the recent past and saw in a dream that he divorced his wife, this is evidence of a doubling of the degree of illness and death because of that. And if the dreamer divorced his wife three times in a dream, this indicates that he He closes a page in his life and will not be able to return to it, and more precisely, he can leave the job in reality, and go to another job and will not return to the old job, or the dream indicates recovery, and whoever has a disease that threatens his life and will not contract this disease again, God willing. Interpretation of divorce The wife in a dream according to other jurists. Today’s jurists said that the symbol of divorce may not be a bad sign, but rather it is evidence of happy developments and beginnings in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer’s life becomes difficult in reality and he sees that he is divorcing his wife in a dream, his crises will end and the Lord of the Worlds will grant him comfort. And stability and a quiet life. Some interpreters said that if the dreamer was following previous beliefs and ideas that had passed a long time ago and had become inconsistent with the current era, and he saw in a dream that he was divorcing his wife, then this is evidence of culture. And a desire to keep up with the times and understand a large number of current ideas so that he can live in society and not feel alienated from it. The dreamer who is afflicted or who has lost a lot of his money while awake, when he divorces his wife in a dream, will regain his material strength, make abundant money, and be able to achieve financial prosperity. In reality. Whoever practices obnoxious and strange habits in reality and sees in a dream that he quarreled with his wife and divorced her, this is a happy sign and a way to give up those bad habits. Interpretation of a dream about divorcing his wife by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that if a man divorces his wife in a dream, he is professionally troubled in reality, Where he finds unhappiness and many problems at work, and this makes him decide to leave his job permanently. A sultan or ruler who divorces his wife in a dream means that he will be defeated by his enemies or removed from his position. If the dreamer is sad and suffers from his wife’s illness in reality, and he sees that he is divorcing her in a dream , he will die soon and become one of the dead. But if the fortuneteller divorces his wife once in a dream, this is explained by a large number of interpretations. It will be limited to the following points: Whether or not: If the dreamer leaves his work while he is awake, then this vision indicates returning to work again. Second: If the dreamer intends to divorce his wife in reality and sees that he divorced her once in a dream, this means that he will not be separated from his wife. While awake, they will reconcile and friendship will return between them again. Third: If the dreamer is a merchant and his business fails in reality, and he sees that he has divorced his wife and divorces her in the future.

title: What is the interpretation of the barber in a dream?

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the barber in a dream, the barber is known in Arab countries as the man who owns the barber shop and is responsible for trimming the hair of the head and beard of men and male children, using many tools such as a comb, a razor, and a hair clipper, as people go to improve their appearance and feel good about themselves and their bodies. But what about seeing a barber in a dream, according to the Muslim interpreter Ibn Sirin, you will find this in detail in the following article from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the barber in a dream The symbol of the barber in a dream Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing the barber in a dream is one of the commendable things that always come to indicate the end of worries, relief from distress, and providing peace of mind and body for the dreamer. Whoever sees the barber in his house in a dream and asks him to prepare to start shaving his head, this indicates that he will hear a lot of good news soon, and seeing the barber leaving the dreamer's house after finishing shaving, he will have good skin with the disappearance of obstacles, difficulties and sorrows in his life. As for if the barber leaves the house and takes with him something belonging to the visionary, this indicates that he will be exposed to some obstacles and problems, but he will be able to overcome them soon, God willing. Vision A smiling barber in a dream is good news for many profits and material gains in the field of work. And whoever sees in his dream that there is a barber walking in the street, this indicates the bright future of the vision, through which he will be able to achieve his ambitions and goals in this world. And whoever sees a barber on his way, but he looks sad or upset, this is also good news when the visionary hears happy news and happy events that will happen in his life soon. Also, seeing a clean and tidy barbershop is a sign of the collapse of the visionary's worries and the fulfillment of his desires. While the person who sees in a dream that the barbershop is dirty and unclean, this indicates that there are some worries and problems in his life. Barber's chair in a dream Seeing a barber's chair in a dream is similar to a barber's chair, as it symbolizes comfort, psychological comfort, fulfilling desires, and removing worries in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of a barber's dream for men Seeing a barber in a man's dream indicates good visions that only portend goodness and justice, and God knows best. When you see a barber entering a man's house, this indicates good luck in the world, abundance of livelihood, and the emergence of many happy things in his life And God knows best. Also, seeing a man in a dream being shaved by a barber is an indication that the visionary spends his money on the cause of God, as he spends on charitable works in society. A man seeing a barber removing all the hair from his head indicates the end of the man’s worries and the end of all his problems, God willing. While anyone who sees in a dream that he goes to the barber to shave only half of his beard, this vision is a warning to him of a loss in work and a loss of money. Interpretation of seeing a barber in a dream for a single woman Seeing a barber in the dream of an unmarried woman is commendable. If she sees a barber shaving a man’s mustache in her dream, this means that abundant goodness

title: Interpretation of dreams of an advanced groom and I am married in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a married woman: There is no doubt that every girl dreams of marriage, and throughout adolescence she draws the specifications of a dream about a knight, but what if a married woman sees in her dream that there is a groom proposing to her, or the interpretation of a dream about a groom? In a married woman, what is the interpretation of dreams about his daughter’s proposed marriage and I am married. It should be noted that this dream carries within it many interpretations and multiple associations, as the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the condition of the married woman, and also differs according to the interpretations of different scholars. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a groom for a woman The married woman’s interpretation of the dream of the groom is advanced and I am pregnant. The interpretation of dreams for his daughter’s husband is advanced and I am married among the incomprehensible dreams of women. This is how the site is different. Clarifying Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of the groom for the married woman, which is: Ibn Sirin says that if a woman dreams that the groom proposes to her despite her marriage, then this vision indicates that her condition will change for the better by something God. But if a married woman sees that there is a groom proposing to her and she feels happy, then this is evidence of the contentment and happy life that the woman lives with her husband. Ibn Sirin explains that if a married woman sees in her dream that the groom is proposing to her, and this is a well-known and famous person in reality, then this The vision is considered good news for her, as it means that it will be abundant. Good soon. And if a married woman sees in her dream a groom and a large, luxurious wedding, this is a sign that one day she will receive a share of glory and power. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about an advanced groom and I am pregnant. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a dress The wedding in a married woman’s dream means that God Almighty will relieve her of her distress, remove her worries, and nourish her abundantly, God willing. He also indicated that the interpretation of dreams for his daughter’s husband who proposes and I am married is evidence of happiness and stability in her married life. This vision also indicates that God will bless her with pregnancy soon. Ibn Sirin also says that if a married woman sees in a dream that there is a man in the form of a groom who proposes to her and the marriage takes place and the marriage takes place in the dream, then this vision is considered a warning. One of the problems, misfortunes and unpleasant things for a woman is for her. But if a woman sees this vision and there is a sick person in her house, then this vision indicates that the sick person will soon die. And if a married woman sees in her dream that the groom is approaching her while he is unknown and she does not see his face, then this vision means That problems and obstacles will arise in her life. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of a dream about a groom proposing to a married woman. Al-Nabulsi explains that the interpretation of dreams about his daughter’s husband proposing and I am married is evidence that the situation of this married woman has changed for the better and soon. And if a married woman sees in her dream that there is a groom proposing to her and her fiancé, then this vision indicates This married woman will soon hear good and happy news. Perhaps this vision indicates abundant sustenance for her and her husband. Interpretation of dreams that I am a groom and I am married. Many married women wonder

Ibn Sirin explains that if a married woman sees in her dream that the groom is proposing to her, and this is a well-known and famous person in reality, then this The vision is considered good news for her, as it means that it will be abundant. Good soon. And if a married woman sees in her dream a groom and a large, luxurious wedding, this is a sign that one day she will receive a share of glory and power. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a dress The wedding in a married woman’s dream means that God Almighty will relieve her of her distress, remove her worries, and nourish her abundantly, God willing. He also indicated that the interpretation of dreams for his daughter’s husband who proposes and I am married is evidence of happiness and stability in her married life. This vision also indicates that God will bless her with pregnancy soon. Ibn Sirin also says that if a married woman sees in a dream that there is a man in the form of a groom who proposes to her and the marriage takes place and the marriage takes place in the dream, then this vision is considered a warning. One of the problems, misfortunes and unpleasant things for a woman is for her. But if a woman sees this vision and there is a sick person in her house, then this vision indicates that the sick person will soon die. And if a married woman sees in her dream that the groom is approaching her while he is unknown and she does not see his face, then this vision means That problems and obstacles will arise in her life. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of a dream about a groom proposing to a married woman. Al-Nabulsi explains that the interpretation of dreams about his daughter’s husband proposing and I am married is evidence that the situation of this married woman has changed for the better and soon. And if a married woman sees in her dream that there is a groom proposing to her and her fiancé, then this vision indicates This married woman will soon hear good and happy news. Perhaps this vision indicates abundant sustenance for her and her husband. Interpretation of dreams that I am a groom and I am married. Many married women wonder
